abilities.name: effect-spore
abilities.effect: Has a 30% chance of inflcting either paralysis, poison, or sleep on attacking Pokémon on contact.

abilities.name: poison-heal
abilities.effect: Heals for 1/8 max HP after each turn when poisoned in place of damage.

abilities.name: quick-feet
abilities.effect: Increases Speed to 1.5× with a major status ailment.
